sense.gloss: system (range of strata that correspond to a particular time period)
group (e.g. of colors) (colours), family (e.g. of languages), party, school (of thought)
a population sharing a common ancestor (in genetics), strain (e.g. bacterial)
company, etc. set up with Japanese capital, company managed by Japanese or non-Japanese of Japanese descent
keiretsu (group), conglomeration of businesses linked by cross-shareholdings
humanities, social sciences, and fine arts, liberal arts
Milky Way galaxy, Milky Way, the Galaxy
water system, river system, drainage system
phylogenetic tree, genealogical tree, family tree, evolutionary tree, dendrogram
system of crystallization, system of crystallisation
